title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 30 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 30 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Wherever Clay goes, mask mandates follow. Nevada bringing back mask mandates. Australia calls in the military to enforce lockdown. Democrats love to rule through fear control. Surgeon General: Wear a mask in own immediate family based on vaccination status. Biden floats the idea of a federal mask mandate. DeSantis leads the pushback. Thank God for Federalism!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
